tail.name: tail
tail.transformationDescription:
#IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) A woolly, sheep-like tail sprouts from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until it's about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that [npc.she] [npc.has] a very limited amount of control over it, and can only swat it from side to side.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] a [style.boldSheep(sheep-like tail)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ELSE [npc.TailCount] woolly, sheep-like tails sprout from just above [npc.her] ass, rapidly growing in size until they're each about [npc.tailLength] long. [npc.She] quickly [npc.verb(realise)] that [npc.she] [npc.has] a very limited amount of control over them, and can only swat them from side to side.
[npc.Name] now [npc.has] [npc.tailCount] [style.boldSheep(sheep-like tails)], [npc.materialDescriptor] [npc.tailFullDescription(true)]. #ENDIF
tail.bodyDescription: Growing out from just above [npc.her] ass, [npc.sheHasFull] #IF(npc.getTailCount()==1) a #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] sheep tail, which [npc.she] can just about swish from side to side. #ELSE [npc.tailCount] #IF(npc.isTailFeral()) [style.colourFeral(feral)],#ENDIF [npc.tailColour(true)] sheep tails, which [npc.she] can just about swish from side to side. #ENDIF
